ðŸ“– Summary: The PageIndex MCP repository provides a Multi-Client Protocol (MCP) server that allows users to chat with long PDFs using Claude, even when they encounter limit restrictions. It leverages a reasoning-based RAG system to provide human-like interactions with documents, offering features like local and online PDF support and unlimited conversations.
